data.title: Topen
data.description: Antibacterial ball pen with push-up mechanism and grey color pointer. Smooth finish, with jumbo cartridge and blue ink.  Products with antibacterial treatments are able to drastically reduce the bacterial levels present on the surfaces of the materials, thanks to the addition of permanent static microbial agents, with high effectiveness in inhibiting and preventing bacterial contamination.  Item according to the ISO 22196 standard, which determines the antibacterial activity in plastic materials and non-porous surfaces. This allows us to know the effectiveness of microbial inhibition that additives have on treated objects by means of a quantitave evaluation.

similar.title: Pissek
similar.description: Nature line Apron, made of recycled cotton. With a front pocket and adjustment straps, fitting under the knee. Available in a wide range of colours, with recycled cotton distinctive in the label.

similar.title: Halgar
similar.description: Nature line case made of recycled cotton. Zippered main compartment and matching puller, with recycled cotton distinctive in the label.

similar.title: Fenin
similar.description: Nature line drawstring backpack, made of strong, 140g/m2 recycled cotton, with matching, 70cm, carry handles. Strings in natural cotton, with reinforced metal rings and recycled cotton distinctive in the label. Available in a wide range of colours. Resistance up to 9kg.

similar.title: Martha
similar.description: Bag of nature line in resistant cotton of 170g/m2 and original grille finish. Long cotton handles (60 cm) and reinforced. Stitched finish and resistance up to 8kg.

similar.title: Casim
similar.description: Nature line bag in organic cotton of 140g/m2. Long handles in organic cotton (70 cm) and reinforced. Stitched finish and resistance up to 8kg, with organic cotton distinctive in the label.
